sentences.en: Are your troops prepared for that kind of firepower?
sentences.cn: 你们的军队准备好应对这种火力了 吗 ?

sentences.en: As long as they have this kind of firepower, they're never going to stop.
sentences.cn: 一旦他们拥有了这种程度的火力, 他们就不准备停下来了.

sentences.en: But the methods and firepower used in attacks have improved as well.
sentences.cn: 但攻击的方式和火力也有所加强.

sentences.en: Firepower freely adjusts, and persist stabilization.
sentences.cn: 火力大小自由调节, 而持续稳定.

sentences.en: However, the biggest advantage for the Redeemer isn't its firepower.
sentences.cn: 但是, 救赎者最大的优势并不是它的炮火.

sentences.en: In Iraq and Afghanistan numbers matter more than firepower.
sentences.cn: 在伊拉克和阿富汗,军队的数量要比火力来的重要.

sentences.en: Often ignored by most players because they have not much firepower.
sentences.cn: 通常大部分的玩家都会忽略这项设施,因为它的火力不够强.

sentences.en: The artillery has more firepower than the infantry.
The company has enormous financial firepower.
The defenders have all the mobility, the numerical superiority, and the firepower.
sentences.cn: 但是守军却有全部的机动性, 有数量上的优势和火力上的优势.

sentences.en: The Juggernaut Firepower at Heroic Level is something to be noted.
sentences.cn: 英雄级别神像得火力需要特别提及.

sentences.en: The precision firepower must be combined with ground forces.
sentences.cn: 精确打击火力必须与地面部队相结合.

sentences.en: There is no shortage of financial firepower to fund atomic research.
sentences.cn: 原子能研究不愁没有财力支持。

sentences.en: This concentration of airborne firepower wrought havoc with the enemy forces.
sentences.cn: 这次机载火力的集中攻击给敌军造成很大破坏.

sentences.en: To attack ( an enemy ) with heavy firepower; strafe or bombard.
sentences.cn: 轰炸(敌军 ) 用猛烈的火力 、 轰炸或炮击进攻 ( 敌人)

sentences.en: Your men are stranded. The defenders have all the mobility, the numerical superiority, and the firepower.
sentences.cn: 你的人进退两难.但是守军却有全部的机动性, 有数量上的优势和火力上的优势.

trans.tran_en: the number of weapons that an army, military vehicle etc has available
